description: This file contains CMake functions, macros, and scripts designed for build configuration. It includes functions for managing target properties, generating configuration files, handling dependencies, and install routines specific to CMake-based projects.

methods.name: add_element
methods.description: Appends an element to a specified list variable.

methods.name: _get_default_link_name
methods.description: Derives a standardized link name and location from a library path.

methods.name: get_if_link_libraries
methods.description: Retrieves and processes link libraries and directories for a target, including dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_defines
methods.description: Collects compile-time definitions from a target, including interface dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_options
methods.description: Gathers compile options from a target and its interface dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_include_dirs
methods.description: Collects include directories from a target and its interface dependencies, resolving paths.

methods.name: InstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Generates and installs CMake configuration files for a target, supporting versioning and dependencies.

methods.name: InstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Creates and installs pkg-config (.pc) files with options for include dirs, defines, and dependencies.

methods.name: InstallFindModule
methods.description: Installs CMake find modules (*.cmake files) from specified directories, optionally recursively.

methods.name: print_properties
methods.description: Outputs a list of CMake properties supported.

methods.name: print_target_properties
methods.description: Displays all properties of a specified target.

methods.name: semicolon_safe_string
methods.description: Replaces semicolons in a string with a placeholder to ensure string safety.

methods.name: InstallCompatibleCMakeConfig
methods.description: Creates an interface library to support legacy target compatibility with install rules and public headers.
